description:
When http://anidb.net/ch109968 [Koguma] lets it slip in class that she owns a motorbike, she attracts the attention of http://anidb.net/ch109970 [Reiko], one of the girls who sits near her. Reiko insists on seeing Koguma`s Cub, as well as showing off her own, and is pleased to meet a fellow Cub rider.
Source: Funimation
